title: Diamond team looking for coach
body:
Hi we are a Diamond team looking for a coach to help improve our teamplay and evolve to humans from chimps. we were all diamond last season except support so bonus if you know how support works at a high level as he needs the most individual coaching. we are a pretty positive team and looking to all get high diamond this year. we are pretty fun people and all respond to criticism well so i would say we are easy to coach. the biggest reason we want a coach is for helping us learn how to play league of legends as a team  practicing efficiently and stuff like that, basically we need more of a manager than an analyst if that makes sense. 
we normally try to play whenever everyone is available so our playing time is normally in the early evenings (6est-whenever) during the week to late at night on weekends.
If you have any interest in helping us out please add me in game: SWH Blush or on discord: Blush9331
